thread.title: The room is modern as you can expect and the bathroom toilet was large.
thread.title_full: The room is modern as you can expect and the bathroom toilet was large. - Review of Holiday Inn San Francisco - Intl Airport, South San Francisco, CA - TripAdvisor

author: garyexpat
title: The room is modern as you can expect and the bathroom toilet was large.
text:
The hotel is good, there are extra fee's though like you pay for parking and there was a 50 dollar room deposit. Other then that I had a great time and room was clean and no smoke smell but it did have a bit of a musty smell. The room is modern as you can expect and the bathroom toilet was large. Bed was compfy and pillows were soft. We had to go back to the counter when our room key didnt work in the elevator. The airport is literally just down the street, we took that instead of the highway.
Room Tip: get the one furthest from the sounds of Houlihans See more room tips See all photos
